author: senh
title: Video Shows Passengers Boo as Woman Booted From Flight
text: BING NEWS: Video Shows Passengers Boo as Woman Booted From American Airlines Flight An Oregon woman says she was booted from an American Airlines flight for no good reason as other passengers hollered and booed. The moment was captured on cellphone video on Sunday. The footage shows Tiana Fough, 27, sobbing and pleading with a flight ... 10/15/2015 - 3:48 am | View Link American Airlines: Video shows crew booed by passengers after weeping woman is booted off flight “Are you serious?” one woman said. “That’s the last time I fly American,” the man sitting beside Fough shook his head. “Shame on American!” Almost in unison, the passengers started to boo at the flight crew. “I’ve seen people who deserve ... 10/15/2015 - 3:19 am | View Link Video shows passengers boo American Airlines flight crew for kicking woman off plane Passengers on an American Airlines flight were so outraged over the way a flight attendant booted a fellow traveler off a plane that they booed the entire flight crew throughout the ordeal. (DepositPhotos) PORTLAND, Oregon — Passengers on an American ... 10/14/2015 - 11:46 pm | View Link Video shows passengers boo flight crew for kicking woman off plane PORTLAND, Oregon — Passengers on an American Airlines flight were so outraged over the way a flight attendant booted a fellow traveler off a plane that they booed the entire flight crew throughout the ordeal.
